subject: Plus x vs plus x ultra
description_text:
Hey ive been looking into these two pedals. I actually ordered and recieved
the plus x pedals. Im confused on which one is the upgraded version. I saw
some reviews that said one of these recieved an update but the other is
still a flawed or older version. Is the plus x ultra updated like the plus
x pedals? And is there any difference between the two?

conversations.body_text: Hi Manuel Mo,  Both PlusX and ProX Ultra are the latest models. Please send me the link to the review where the issue is mentioned, and I will check it and verify the customer’s reported problem.

Ive watched a lot of videos. It might have been older. My question now is.
Am I able to exchange the plus pedals I have for the ultra? I havent used
the pedals but i have started putting it together. I have the gas and breal
pedal on but i havent used them because I am still putting together my sim

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026, 7:04 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Manuel Mo,    These are all minor issues, and we continuously optimize and update them during the production process. Your current PlusX version is working correctly. The Ultra version mainly adds LED effects and 8-level hydraulic adjustment, while the current PlusX is already a very mature and high-quality product.  Considering that international return shipping costs are high and can even exceed the actual value of the product, I personally believe that there is no absolute need for you to upgrade to the Ultra version.

So if I ship these back for a return or exchange I will pay more in
shipping fees than what they cost?
I bought from your website. Is the return directly back to ourside the
united states?

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026, 8:44 PM support@simsonn.com

For context I live in fort worth texas.

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026, 8:56 PM Manuel Mo <morales.manuel.ymla@gmail.com>
wrote:

> So if I ship these back for a return or exchange I will pay more in
> shipping fees than what they cost?
> I bought from your website. Is the return directly back to ourside the
> united states?
>
> On Sat, Jan 10, 2026, 8:44 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Manuel Mo,  The shipping and customs costs for returning items to China are very high. If the item is returned to our US warehouse, it would effectively be disposed of, as the warehouse does not provide repair services and cannot handle repackaging or return inspection.

How much would it cost to return to china?

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026, 9:12 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Manuel Mo,    The Plus X pedal you've received is our latest release. The Pro X Ultra features an adjustable hydraulic damper and more advanced electronics within the control unit, enabling precise control—ideal for experienced players seeking fine-tuned adjustments. Equipped with an RGB system that provides real-time feedback based on in-game telemetry data, its more aesthetically pleasing lighting design and form factor enhance the overall atmosphere. If these features are not required, the Plus X pedal offers superior value—utilizing the same high-quality elastomer, 200kg-rated sensors, and equally robust structural design.
The Plus X pedals are just as good, don't worry.

Ok I understand. Thank you

On Mon, Jan 12, 2026, 5:06 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Manuel Mo,    Thank you for your understanding. Have fun!
